title: Instadapp Assembly Portal - Bounty
body:
Bounty Description:
The purpose of the bounty is twofold. 
- First, it would be to develop the connectors & resolvers to integrate mStable into Instadapp DeFi Smart Layer. 
- Second, it would be to create and deploy an Assembly page for mStable

This would enable all InstDapp users to access and interact with mStable Save features & InstaDapp automated yield / leveraging strategies called *Casts * (https://docs.instadapp.io/get-started/cast)

Desired Impact:
mStable functionality and ecosystem will be integrated into Instadapp DeFi Smart Layer.

- This would enable all InstDapp users to access and interact with mStable Save & InstaDapp automated yield / leveraging strategies called *Casts * (https://docs.instadapp.io/get-started/cast) 

- mStable will also be accessible via the Assembly frontend (https://assembly.instadapp.io/)

This integration would unlock mUSD deposits into Instadapp as well as potentially increase the volume of mUSD deposited into Save, mStable Save being part of potential *Casts*

Additional Comments:
Instadapp already put up its own bounty for this integration idea, link below
https://gov.instadapp.io/t/open-mstable-development-snowball/488

Bounty Amount: 
1300 MTA
Instadapp offered 300-350 INST, i.e $1500.
author: 0xC5e1569772b2d425Ac9469d39F17341C01e1CF4c
